text: Balad () is a political party in Israel. It is a Hebrew acronym of Brit Le'umit Demokratit (). Balad () is also an Arabic word. It means "country" or "nation". Balad's full Arabic name is at-Tajammuʿ al-Waṭanī ad-Dīmuqrāṭī ().Its ideology is social democratic, Arab nationalist, pan-Arabic, secular, and anti-Zionist. Balad was founded in 1995. The party's political leader is Sami Abu Shehadeh. As of 2022, Balad has no seats in the Knesset. == Other websites == * Category:1995 establishments in Asia Category:Nationalist organizations in Israel Category:Social democratic parties Category:Political parties in Israel Category:1990s establishments in Israel
title: Balad
